id.description: Unique identifier for the location (Provided by application)

name.description: Name of the delve (e.g., Abandoned Mine, Sunken Temple)

description.description: Overall description of the delve's theme, atmosphere, and history

parentLocationId.description: ID of the parent location (e.g., Wilds ID, provided by application)

purpose.description: The original purpose or reason this delve exists

delve_rooms.description: List of rooms in the delve, typically following 5-room structure. LLM uses names, application generates IDs.

name.description: Specific name for this room (e.g., Flooded Entry Chamber)

role.description: Conceptual role (Entrance, Puzzle, Setback, Climax, Reward)

description.description: Detailed description of the room's appearance and contents

challenge.description: Primary obstacle, puzzle, or encounter in this room.

hinting_at.description: What secret, plot hook, or information this POI might reveal

why_its_here.description: Reason this valuable is in this specific room

where_exactly.description: Precise location within the room (e.g., chest, altar, corpse)
